title: UK PM Johnson dismissed COVID-19 lockdown as only elderly would die, ex-aide says
content:
1. UK PM Johnson dismissed COVID-19 lockdown as only elderly would die, ex-aide says  Reuters UK
  2. Boris Johnson opposed lockdowns because people who were dying were 'essentially all over 80': ex chief advisor  msnNOW
  3. Agree with him or not, Dominic Cummings's words matter  BBC News
  4. Cummings: Johnson did not want to impose second lockdown last autumn  EURACTIV
  5. Dominic Cummings: The Interview Trailer - BBC  BBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
UK PM Johnson dismissed COVID-19 lockdown as only elderly would die, ex-aide says  Reuters UK
Boris Johnson opposed lockdowns because people who were dying were 'essentially all over 80': ex chief advisor  msnNOW
Agree with him or not, Dominic Cummings's words matter  BBC News
Cummings: Johnson did not want to impose second lockdown last autumn  EURACTIV
Dominic Cummings: The Interview Trailer - BBC  BBC

localize.title: ジョンソン英首相、COVID-19のロックダウンは高齢者しか死なないと見切っていた、元補佐官が語る
前助手说，英国首相约翰逊认为只有老人会死，因此驳回了COVID-19的封锁措施
前助手說，英國首相約翰遜認爲只有老人會死，因此駁回了COVID-19的封鎖措施
